parameters.formTitle: AI learning Coach - Get Your Personalized ROadmap
parameters.formDescription: Tell us what you want to learn, and we'll create custom learning path for you!

parameters.text:
=You are an expert learning coach who creates comprehensive, structured learning roadmaps.

create a detailed learning roadmap for the ffollowins :
** Topic: ** {{ $json.topic }}
** Current Skill level: ** {{ $json.current_level }}
**Daily Time Commitment: **  {{ $json['time_commitments (hrs/day)'] }}
** Total Duration: ** {{ $json['Duration (in weeks)']}} weeks

Plaese structured the roadmao as follows :

## Learning Path Overview

provide a brief 2-3 sentence overview of what the learner will achieve and why this learning path is structure this way

##Learning Phases

###Phase 1: Beginner Fundamentals (Weeks 1-2) List 6-8 core foundational topics with:
Topic name
Brief 1-line description
- Estimated time to learn

### Phase 2: Intermediate Concepts (Weeks 3-4) List 6-8 intermediate topics building on the fundamentals

### Phase 3: Advanced Topics (Weeks 5-6) List 6-8 advanced concepts and real-world applications

##Suggested Daily Schedule

Break down how to structure each day:
Time allocation per activity
Daily goals
Weekly milestones

##Milestone Checkpoints
Define 3-4 key checkpoints where the learner should:
Test their knowledge
Build a small project
Review and consolidate learning

#Recommended Resources
Suggest 5-7 high-quality resources:
Official documentation
Video tutorials
Books
Practice platforms
Community forums

## Pro Tips
3-5 practical tips for successful learning in this domain

Format your responses in clean readable markdown with proper header bullet points and emojis for visual appeal.
